name: Heavy-Duty Racing
description:
To become the most powerful driver, you must be the first one to get to the wisdom scrolls.  However other drivers are here to try and win as well and they won't go easy. 

 Press SPACE to increase your weight for a few seconds and send nearby drivers flying or land a jump faster saving valuable seconds.  

Press SHIFT to decrease your weight for a few seconds and send yourself flying, useful for getting out of a jam or getting past obstacle, however doing so with not enough speed will cause the wind to send you flying back.

Use WASD to move.  The more time playing the better your control over the car will be.

Press R to restart.  Your best spell, you can restart the race using your loop magic.   Your best spell, you can restart the race using your loop magic. Your best spell, you can restart the race using your loop magic. Your best spell, you can restart the race using your loop magic. Your best spell, you can restart the race using your loop magic.
